jei.pedestals.filterbase.desc: The Base Filter Item, used to craft other filters. Note for All Filters: Crouch+Right Click on an inventory to set the filter, Crouch+Right while not pointing at a block to change the type, put this in your offhand and right click on a pedestal with an empty main hand to insert it, remove by having the filter tool or another filter in your off hand and left clicking a pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filteritem.desc: 將輸入的物品和下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許相匹配的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filteritemstack.desc: 將輸入的物品下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，，僅允許物品堆相匹配的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filtermod.desc: 將輸入的物品下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許同一模組的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filtertag.desc: 將輸入的物品下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許物品名和標籤名相匹配的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filterenchanted.desc: 僅接受附魔物品透過基座。
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedfuzzy.desc: 將輸入的物品和下面的儲存空間內的物品進行比較。檢查傳入物品的附魔是否與過濾器的附魔物品相匹配（無論等級）。若匹配則透過。
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedexact.desc: 將輸入的物品和下面的儲存空間內的物品進行比較。檢查傳入物品的附魔是否與過濾器的附魔物品的附魔相匹配。若匹配則透過。
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedcount.desc: 檢查輸入物品的附魔數量，若數量與升級次數匹配，則可以透過。
jei.pedestals.filterdurability.desc: This upgrade will only allow items with durability over the specified threshold to pass through.
jei.pedestals.filterrestriction.desc: This Restricts more then X items from being in the pedestal, when setting up the filter, the total count of all items in the inventory is used, the value cannot exceed 64.
jei.pedestals.craftingpattern.desc: Set patterns by putting recipes in an inventory, then recording the recipes in the pattern with crouch+right click on the inventory
jei.pedestals.crafter1mk2.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal, The crafter will look at the pattern, if enough items exist for the craft, it will craft the recipe,if not itll skip it, then move on to the next patterned recipe.
jei.pedestals.crafter2mk2.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal, The crafter will look at the pattern, if enough items exist for the craft, it will craft the recipe,if not itll skip it, then move on to the next patterned recipe.
jei.pedestals.crafter3mk2.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal, The crafter will look at the pattern, if enough items exist for the craft, it will craft the recipe,if not itll skip it, then move on to the next patterned recipe.
pedestals.wip: [WIP] This is a Work In Progress Upgrade, it currently will not be able to craft recipes with 'Container' Items in them.
pedestals.advanced_warning: Your upgrade isnt running at peak efficiency, to unlock its full potential, apply the Advanced Enchantment to it.
pedestals.advanced_disabled_warning: This Upgrade has been deemed unworthy of the Advanced Enchant, and thus, none of its effects can be activated.
item.pedestals.linkingtool.tool_link_uns: 連接失敗 - 已達到最大連接數
item.pedestals.linkingtool.tool_block_un: 未儲存任何方塊的坐標
item.pedestals.linkingtool.tool_linked: 將物品傳輸到這個坐標的基座:
jei.pedestals.linkingtool.desc: Crafted with a recipe or by Crouch+Right Clicking a Backwards Linking Tool in the Air (Backwards Linking Tool cannot have a pedestal selected) Shift-R-Click the pedestal Receiving items to select it, Shift-R-Click on the pedestal Sending Items to link the two pedestals. Used In crafting to create most base items in the mod.
item.pedestals.linkingtoolbackwards.tool: 連接失敗 - 已達到最大連接數
未儲存任何方塊的坐標
將物品傳輸到這個坐標的基座:
jei.pedestals.linkingtoolbackwards.desc: Crafted by Crouch+Right Clicking a Linking Tool in the Air (Linking Tool cannot have a pedestal selected) Shift-R-Click the pedestal Sending items to select it, Shift-R-Click on the pedestal Receiving Items to link the two pedestals. Used In crafting to create most base items in the mod.
jei.pedestals.tagtool.desc: Crafting:  By Crouch+Right Clicking a Filter Swapper in the Air, until it swaps to the Tag Tool. Uses: With an item in your off hand, r-click the tag tool in the air. In chat the list of tags the item has will appear.
item.pedestals.upgradetool.tool_block_un: 未儲存任何方塊的坐標
jei.pedestals.upgradetool.desc: Crafting:  With a recipe, or by Crouch+Right Clicking a Tag Tool in the Air, until it swaps to the Upgrade Tool. Uses: Right Click, with this in hand, on an upgraded pedestal to get details about the upgrade. This can be used in the offhand to remove Upgrades from the pedestal with a left click.
jei.pedestals.toolswapper.desc: Crafting: By Crouch+Right Clicking an Upgrade Tool in the Air, until it swaps to the Tool Swapper (Upgrade Tool cannot have a pedestal selected) Uses: A tool in your offhand can be added to a pedestal with a right click. Right Clicking on a pedestal using this item will display details about the tool inside. This can be used in the offhand to remove filters from the pedestal with a left click.
jei.pedestals.filterswapper.desc: Crafting: By Crouch+Right Clicking a Tool Swapper in the Air, until it swaps to the Filter Swapper. Uses: Right clicking on a pedestal that has a filter will give you a list of whats being filtered. This can be used in the offhand to remove filters from the pedestal with a left click.
jei.pedestals.itemcolorpallet.desc: 可以由調色板和紅色/綠色/藍色染料合成. 可以被重新染色.
jei.pedestals.itemcolorpalletdefault.des: 製作調色板: 在地上投擲出紅色/綠色/藍色染料， 然後投擲出你想染色的調色板， 用連接工具對地上右鍵，就可以合成出調色板。
jei.pedestals.upgradespeed.desc: 在基座上使用以提高其傳輸物品的速度
jei.pedestals.upgradecapacity.desc: 在基座上使用以增加一個每次傳輸物品的數量。
jei.pedestals.upgraderange.desc: Use on a Pedestal to Increase the Range it can send items to.
jei.pedestals.upgraderoundrobin.desc: Crafted by right clicking on the ground with a Linking Tool, when paper is also on the ground, near chickens or parrots. Use on a Pedestal to Switch it to 'Round Robin' Transfer Mode.
jei.pedestals.upgradesoundmuffler.desc: Crafted by right clicking a Linking Tool near a sheep when paper is on the ground. Use on a Pedestal to Disable any sounds it makes.
jei.pedestals.upgradeparticlediffuser.de: Crafted by right clicking on the ground with the Linking Tool when paper is on the ground nearby, while you are outside during a rainstorm. Use on a Pedestal to disable any particles it makes.
jei.pedestals.bookspeed.desc: Will only accept the Pedestal Speed Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookcapacity.desc: Will only accept the Pedestal Capacity Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookrange.desc: Will only accept the Pedestal Range Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookarea.desc: Will only accept the Pedestal Area Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookadvanced.desc: Will only accept the Pedestal Advanced Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookmagnet.desc: Will only accept the Pedestal Magnet Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
item.pedestals.coin.attack.tooltip_rate: 每次攻擊造成的基礎傷害：
item.pedestals.coin.attack.chat_rate: 每次攻擊造成的估計傷害:
jei.pedestals.attack.desc: Attacks Entities in the area around it, Placing a Block of Netherite/Emerald/Diamond/Gold/Iron Under the pedestal will change what is attacked. Putting a sword into the pedestal will increase the damage delt, Sharpness/Bane/Smite on the sword also increases attack damage. (Magnetic) (Filterable)
death.attack.pedestal5: %1$s life was taken by a mysterious force
death.attack.pedestal8: %1$s 的刀子因為沒有好好拿著而滑下來了
death.attack.pedestal12: %1$s, We told you not to play around with sharp things!
jei.pedestals.recycler.desc: Recycles Tools, Armor, and Other Items back into Materials. Damaged Items will give back based on their remaining durability
jei.pedestals.breaker.desc: This Upgrade will Break the Block Below The Pedestal, Range Makes it break a block farther down. If a Pickaxe is put in the pedestal, the breaker will use that tool to break blocks. (Magnetic) (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.chopper.desc: This Upgrade will break tree blocks in an area around the pedestal, If an Axe is put in the pedestal, the Chopper will use that tool to chop blocks. (Magnetic) (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.choppershrooms.desc: This Upgrade will break Mushroom/Nether Shroom blocks in an area around the pedestal, If an Axe is put in the pedestal, the Chopper will use that tool to chop blocks. (Magnetic) (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.cobble.desc: By Default This Will Generate Cobblestone, If a stack exists in the buffer, 1 Stack of cobblestone will always be available in the pedestal. You Can drop Cobble on the pedestal to store it in the buffer. The buffer holds ~2 billion cobble. Putting Specific Blocks under the pedestal may change what the generator produces.
jei.pedestals.itemtank.desc: Stores Lots of 1 type of Item, If a stack exists in the buffer, 1 Stack will always be available in the pedestal. You Can The Item on the pedestal to store it in the buffer. The buffer holds up to ~2 billion items when enchanted.
jei.pedestals.crafter1.desc: 把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下，合成升級會查看儲存內的每個格子，查看是否可以合成並輸出，如果可以，他會一直合成直到格子內只剩一個物品。
jei.pedestals.crafter2.desc: 把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下，合成升級會查看儲存空間內的格子，每隔4個格子查看一次，查看是否可以合成並輸出，如果可以，他會一直合成直到格子內只剩一個物品。
jei.pedestals.crafter3.desc: 把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下，合成升級會查看儲存空間內的格子，每隔9個格子查看一次，查看是否可以合成並輸出，如果可以，他會一直合成直到格子內只剩一個物品。
jei.pedestals.compactor2.desc: 將庫存放在基座下方，合成人將查看庫存中的單一插槽，如果是可以壓縮的物品，則會將 1 個物品保留在插槽中。
jei.pedestals.compactor3.desc: 將庫存放在基座下方，合成人將查看庫存中的單一插槽，如果是可以壓縮的物品，則會將 1 個物品保留在插槽中。
jei.pedestals.placeholder.desc: 用於填充用於合成升級用於合成的庫存 (其作用類似於合成表的空白格子).
jei.pedestals.crusher.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can crush Most Ores, Stone, Cobble, Gravel, BlazeRod, SugarCane, Beetroot, P.Potato, Potato, Wheat, Bone, and Vanilla Flowers. (Input Filterable)
jei.pedestals.dropper.desc: 從基座上取走物品並向上投擲，距離升級可以提高物品投擲高度。
jei.pedestals.effect.desc: 把放在基座上的藥水擴散給該區域的所有實體。除非把烈焰粉撒在基座上作為燃料，否則會消耗藥水。在基座下放置獄髓方塊/綠寶石方塊/鑽石方塊/黃金方塊/鐵方塊會改變影響的實體類型
jei.pedestals.grower.desc: 使用骨粉給周圍區域內的植物施肥或種草
jei.pedestals.harvester.desc: Will Break Fully Grown Crops in the area around it. If a Hoe tool is placed in the pedestal above, it'll use that when breaking crops.  (Magnetic) (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.harvesterhives.desc: Will Harvest Combs from Hives in the work area, or when bottles are in the pedestal, it will use those to bottle honey.
jei.pedestals.magnet.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it and put them in the pedestal. (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.planter.desc: 使用基座內的種子，在周圍區域種植農作物。
jei.pedestals.rfexport.desc: 把基座放置在機器上或者放入需要供電的物品，此升級會從網路內提取能量並輸入連接的機器或者其他相容的方塊。
jei.pedestals.rfimport.desc: 放置在機器或者方塊上或放進去可以提供能量的物品，這個升級會將電力從發電機或者相容的方塊中引入到網路。
jei.pedestals.rffuelgen.desc: Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Generation occurs every 20 ticks, This upgrade Generates Energy for the Pedestal Energy Network.
jei.pedestals.rfexpgen.desc: Drop Enchanted Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Generation occurs every 20 ticks, This upgrade Generates Energy for the Pedestal Energy Network.
jei.pedestals.rfrelay.desc: 這個升級可以將能量透過基座傳遞給其他與能量相容的基座。
jei.pedestals.rftank.desc: 這個升級可以在網路中容納大量能量
jei.pedestals.rfcrusher.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Check JEI for recipes. (Input Filterable)
jei.pedestals.rfsmelter.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can Smelt anything a Vanila Furnace can. (Input Filterable)
jei.pedestals.rfsawmill.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Saws Vanilla Wood Blocks Into other wood blocks, or sticks. (Input Filterable)
jei.pedestals.fluidxpconverter.desc: Place Tanks with Compatable Exp/Essence 'Below' the Pedestal, Put Buckets of Fluid in the pedestal, Or Connect this pedestal to one that can transfer it fluid. PEDESTAL WILL ONLY ALLOW ITEMS/FLUIDS THAT ARE IN JEI AS RECIPES TO BE INSERT INTO THE PEDESTAL. Pedestal will store Exp fluids in its buffer, and convert it into exp over time. Exp can be sent to a connected Exp compatable upgraded pedestal.
jei.pedestals.xpanvil.desc: 需要經驗，在基座下面放置儲存空間（例如儲物箱）用於儲存需要維修或者合併的物品。將基座放在升級後的那個基座的東南西北方並在中間留有空格。那四個基座上的物品會和升級後的基座下方儲存的物品融合。
jei.pedestals.xpbottler.desc: 需要經驗，把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下方，把玻璃瓶放在基座上並提供經驗，就可以合成出經驗瓶並放在基座裡。
jei.pedestals.xpmagnet.desc: 經驗磁鐵升級將會手機附近區域的經驗並儲存在升級內。並且會吸收面對該基座的玩家的經驗。當連接了另一個具有經驗升級的基座時，他會把經驗轉移到連接的基座內。
item.pedestals.coin.xpdropper.chat_rate: 每次投擲的經驗的等級:
jei.pedestals.xpdropper.desc: 需要經驗，這個升級會把經驗球投擲在地上。
jei.pedestals.xpenchanter.desc: 需要經驗，在底座下面放置儲存空間（例如儲物箱），最多可以從三個書櫃上獲得附魔的能力，附魔的能力決定了附魔等級，附魔對任何可以附魔的原版物品有效。
jei.pedestals.xpgrindstone.desc: Place an Inventory below the pedestal for grinding inputs. This upgrade will Grind the enchants off of items and return the unenchanted items to the pedestal, while storing the xp from the process in its buffer, which can be transferred out.
jei.pedestals.fluidimport.desc: Imports Fluids from items in the pedestal, or tanks below the pedestal, into the Pedestal Fluid Network. This can transfer fluid into the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidfilteredimport.desc: Imports Fluids from items in the pedestal, or tanks below the pedestal, into the Pedestal Fluid Network, IF it can send those fluids to a pedestal connected to it. This can transfer fluid into the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidexport.desc: Exports Fluids from the pedestal and into items or tanks below the pedestal. This can only receive fluid from the Pedestal Fluid Network, it cannot send fluids. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidpump.desc: Pumps Fluids from its Work Area into an internal tank. Blocks in the pedestal will be used to fill the spaces where fluid is pumped from. This can transfer fluid into the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block. (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.fluiddrain.desc: Drains Fluids from its internal tank, and places it in the world. This only receives fluids from the Pedestal Fluid Network, it cannot send fluids. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidtank.desc: Stores a large amount of 1 fluid. This can transfer or receive fluids from the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidrelay.desc: Mainly used to transfer liquids Within the Pedestal Fluid Network over long distances. This can transfer or receive fluids from the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidcrafter1.desc: 把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下，合成升級會查看儲存內的每個格子，查看是否可以合成並輸出，如果可以，他會一直合成直到格子內只剩一個物品。
jei.pedestals.fluidcrafter2.desc: 把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下，合成升級會查看儲存空間內的格子，每隔4個格子查看一次，查看是否可以合成並輸出，如果可以，他會一直合成直到格子內只剩一個物品。
jei.pedestals.fluidcrafter3.desc: 把儲存空間（例如儲物箱）放在基座下，合成升級會查看儲存空間內的格子，每隔9個格子查看一次，查看是否可以合成並輸出，如果可以，他會一直合成直到格子內只剩一個物品。
jei.pedestals.placeholderbucket.desc: Used to fill up a slot in an inventory being used to craft from with the Fluid Crafting Upgrades (acts like a bucket of fluid in recipes).
jei.pedestals.milker.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for buckets, Will Milk any cows in the area around it, putting the milk buckets in the pedestal. OR If milk is a placeable liquid in your modpack, Just having the upgrade on a pedestal with NO INVENTORY 'UNDER' THE PEDESTAL, will milk cows nearby, putting the fluid in the pedestals fluid buffer.
jei.pedestals.export.desc: 從基座內取出物品並放入基座下的儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內。
jei.pedestals.xprelay.desc: 用於遠距離經驗傳輸的中繼，當透過經驗升級連接到另一個基座時，他會把經驗傳輸到連接的基座上。
jei.pedestals.xptank.desc: 用於儲存大量經驗，當連接到另一個帶有經驗升級的基座時，他會把經驗轉移到連接的基座上。
jei.pedestals.fan.desc: 推動附近區域的敵對生物，在基座下放置一塊獄髓方塊/綠寶石方塊/鑽石方塊/黃金方塊/鐵方塊會改變推動狀態。玩家可以透過蹲下來無視推動效果。
jei.pedestals.smelter.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can Smelt anything a Vanila Furnace can. (Input Filterable)
jei.pedestals.import.desc: 從下面的儲存空間（例如儲物箱）取出物品，並將其放入底座中。或者將底座上的物品放入底座內。
jei.pedestals.fimport.desc: Checks if any items in the 'below' inventory can be sent to a connected pedestal. If true, it pulls those items out of the chest and into the pedestal for the pedestal to send off.
jei.pedestals.placer.desc: 從下面的儲存空間（例如儲物箱）取出物品，若可以放置，則把他們放置在底座下方。距離升級可以增加向下放置方塊的範圍。
jei.pedestals.quarry.desc: This is an AOE block breaker, it requires no fuel, but is incredibly slow. By default it will Mine all blocks in its work area. Enchanting it with Magnet will allow it to suck up any items in its work area.  (Magnetic) (Filterable)
jei.pedestals.restock.desc: 從基座上取走物品，並且只在物品需要填充時才把他們輸出到下面的儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內，不會填充空的格子。（與合成升級配合效果更佳）
jei.pedestals.frestock.desc: Only accepts items when stacks in the inventory 'below' need restocked. Takes Items From the Pedestal, and only inserts them in the below inventory if items stacks need refilled, Will Not fill empty stacks. (Works Best when Paired with Crafting Upgrades)
jei.pedestals.sawmill.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Saws Vanilla Wood Blocks Into other wood blocks, or sticks. (Input Filterable)
jei.pedestals.shearer.desc: 剪附近區域的羊毛，把羊毛放入基座內。
jei.pedestals.teleporter.desc: 把歌萊果或者終界珍珠放在基座上補充燃料，這個升級將傳送任何與其碰撞的實體到它所連接的基座下面，如果下面沒有空間傳送到它，則不會傳送。距離升級將傳送的實體放置在連接的基座下方距離更遠的地方。缺少燃料會導致傳送失敗。
jei.pedestals.void.desc: Will Void all Items inserted or dropped on the pedestal, will also deal Void damage to any entity that touches the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.voidenergy.desc: Will Void all Items and Energy inserted or dropped on the pedestal, will also deal Void damage to any entity that touches the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.voidfluid.desc: Will Void all Items and Fluid inserted or dropped on the pedestal, will also deal Void damage to any entity that touches the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredrestock.desc: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Restocks Items in the Ender Chest from the items in the pedestal (Will keep a stack full, but wont fill empty slots). Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderexport.desc: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Ender Chest and puts it in the Pedestal. Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredexport.desc: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Ender Chest and puts it in the Pedestal, IF the pedestal can send the items somewhere. Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderimport.desc: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Pedestal and puts it in the EnderChest. Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.

jei.pedestals.pedestal333.desc: 基座的六個面都可以放置，用調色盤可以染色，用螢石可以點亮基座並且可以用「升級」進行升級。升級後的基座可以用紅石進行開關。

jei.pedestals.pedestal.stone333.desc: Pedestals Can Be Placed on all 6 sides, Colored with Colored Pallets, Lit up with a Block of Glowstone, and Upgraded with Upgrades. Upgraded Pedestals Can be powered off with a Redstone Signal. (Filterable)
enchantment.pedestals.upgradecapacity.de: Upgrades the transfer rate and/or buffer capacity of pedestal upgrades.
enchantment.pedestals.upgradespeed.desc: Modifies the pedestal upgrades base speed up to 20 times faster
enchantment.pedestals.upgraderange.desc: Modifies the 'vertical' / 'Y' range of a pedestal upgrades work area
enchantment.pedestals.upgradearea.desc: Modifies the AOE area of a pedestal upgrades 'work' area
enchantment.pedestals.upgradeadvanced.de: Can be applied to pedestal upgrades that can use an inventory below for inputs or outputs, will allow ANY entities inventory to use used
enchantment.pedestals.upgrademagnet.desc: Can be applied to pedestal upgrades that dont normally use the items in the pedestal. Giving them the ability to magnet up items in their work area (magnet is non filtered)
advancements.main.root.title: 基座
advancements.main.root.description: The Start to Everything 基座!
advancements.main.craft_pedestal.title: My First Pedestal
advancements.main.craft_upgrade.title: Getting Yet Another Upgrade
advancements.main.craft_focusedbook.desc: Books designed to only get 1 type of enchantment. Downside: must be combined with Upgrades on the Exp Anvil
advancements.main.craft_augment.title: Augmented Transferring
advancements.main.craft_augment.descript: Used to augment pedestals tranferring capabilities
advancements.main.craft_pallet.title: All da Colors!
advancements.main.craft_pallet.descripti: Tossing Color Pallets, and RGB dye on the ground, then smacking it with the linking tool will make colored ones. Colored ones can be applied to newly placed pedestals.
advancements.main.craft_filter.title: Getting Organized
advancements.main.craft_filter.descripti: My recommendation is a Filtered Import sending items to Filtered Exports. Best earlygame sorting in my opinion
jei.pedestals.filteritemb.desc: 將輸入的物品和下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許不匹配的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filteritemstackb.desc: 將輸入的物品下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許物品堆不匹配的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filtermodb.desc: 將輸入的物品下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許不同模組的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.filtertagb.desc: 將輸入的物品下面儲存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品進行比較，僅允許物品名和標籤名不匹配的物品透過。
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredenchantedimpo: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Pedestal and puts it in the EnderChest.  ONLY items that are Enchanted can be sent to the Pedestal with this upgrade.Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredexactimport.d: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Pedestal and puts it in the EnderChest.  ONLY items that are the same Itemstack as items in the Ender Chest can be sent to the Pedestal with this upgrade.Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredfoodimport.de: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Pedestal and puts it in the EnderChest.  ONLY items that are Food items can be sent to the Pedestal with this upgrade. Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredfuzzyimport.d: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Pedestal and puts it in the EnderChest. ONLY items that match items in the Ender Chest can be sent to the Pedestal with this upgrade. Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.enderfilteredmodimport.des: Player who places upgrade on pedestal, assigns it to their Ender Chest Inventory. This upgrade Removes Items from the Pedestal and puts it in the EnderChest. ONLY items that are the same MOD as items in the Ender Chest can be sent to the Pedestal with this upgrade. Do to the inconsistencies of Ender Magic, this upgrade only work when the player is in the same dimension.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedb.desc: 僅接受沒有附魔的物品透過基座。
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedexactb.desc: 將輸入的物品和下面的儲存空間內的物品進行比較。檢查傳入物品的附魔是否與過濾器的附魔物品的附魔相匹配。若不匹配則透過。
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedfuzzyb.desc: 將輸入的物品和下面的儲存空間內的物品進行比較。檢查傳入物品的附魔是否與過濾器的附魔物品相匹配（無論等級）。若不匹配則透過。
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitem.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it， if they match the items in the below inventory， and put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitemb.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it， if they dont match the items in the below inventory， and put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitemstack.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it， if they match the itemstack in the below inventory， it'll put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitemstackb.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it， if they dont match the itemstack in the below inventory， it'll put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetmod.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it， and if they match the mod of the items in the below inventory， it'll put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetmodb.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it， and if they dont match the mod of the items in the below inventory， it'll put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.xprelayblocked.desc: Used as a relay for transferring xp long distances,  When linked to another pedestal with an XP upgrade, it will transfer Exp to the linked Pedestal. It prevents Items from passing through though.
jei.pedestals.fluidrelayblocked.desc: Mainly used to transfer liquids Within the Pedestal Fluid Network over long distances. This can transfer or receive fluids from the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block. It prevents Items from passing through though.
jei.pedestals.rfrelayblocked.desc: This upgrade can pass energy through pedestals to other energy compatible pedestals. It prevents Items from passing through though.
jei.pedestals.fexportitem.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Will only accept and insert matching items.
jei.pedestals.fexportitemstack.desc: Compares Incoming ItemStacks to those in the inventory below. Will only accept and insert matching ItemStacks.
jei.pedestals.fexportmod.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Will only accept and insert items from the same Mod.
jei.pedestals.fexportfood.desc: Will only accept and insert food items.
jei.pedestals.fexportenchanted.desc: Will only accept and insert enchanted items.
jei.pedestals.rfquarry.desc: 在基座下面放置儲存空間（例如儲物箱）用於輸入物品，將其連接到基座能量網路補充燃料，從基座頂部輸出物品。只挖掘與下方儲存相匹配的方塊。
item.pedestals.coin.rfquarryb.tooltip_na: 能量採石場黑名單升級
jei.pedestals.rfquarryb.desc: 在基座下面放置儲存空間（例如儲物箱）用於輸入物品，將其連接到基座能量網路補充燃料，從基座頂部輸出物品。只挖掘與下方儲存空間不匹配的方塊。
jei.pedestals.quarryb.desc: 在基座下面放置儲存空間（例如儲物箱）用於輸入物品，把燃料放在基座上進行補充，從基座頂部輸出物品。僅輸出不匹配下面的庫存空間（例如儲物箱）內的物品。
jei.pedestals.filterdurabilityless.desc: This upgrade will only allow items with durability below the specified threshold to pass through.
jei.pedestals.fluidfilter.desc: Checks an Inventory Below for buckets of fluid, will only allow matching fluids to be transferred to this pedestal. This can transfer or receive fluids from the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidfilterblacklist.desc: Checks an Inventory Below for buckets of fluid, will only allow non matching fluids to be transferred to this pedestal. This can transfer or receive fluids from the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidpumpfilter.desc: Pumps Fluids from its Work Area into an internal tank. Checks an Inventory Below for buckets of fluid, will only allow matching fluids to be transferred or pumped into this pedestal. Blocks in the pedestal will be used to fill the spaces where fluid is pumped from. This can transfer fluids into the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.fluidpumpfilterblacklist.d: Pumps Fluids from its Work Area into an internal tank. Checks an Inventory Below for buckets of fluid, will only allow non matching fluids to be transferred or pumped into this pedestal. Blocks in the pedestal will be used to fill the spaces where fluid is pumped from. This can transfer fluids into the Pedestal Fluid Network. To Clear Fluid From Upgrade, Hold the Upgrade Tool in your off hand, then shift+right click the coin in your main hand on any block.
jei.pedestals.restriction.desc: This upgrade will restrict how many items can be sent to it at once, and if full, wont allow any more items to be sent.
